name: Arcane Cascade
description:
You are a wizard. Your spells bounce, your spells bounce, your spells explode. Try to destroy as much as you can.

Controls:

  • LMB to cast your spell
  • ESC to restart level
  • T for Speedrun Mode

Made by ruby in 72 hours for Mini Jam 104.

Follow me on Twitter for more updates! You'll get to see cool things like this thread of the development process of Arcane Cascade!
